page.title: 13LADYBIRD NURSERY,FENSTANTON
page.content: The {Nursery}is situated along the{High Street}and was opened by Mrs Crosby.She is a qualified nurse and midwife and lives in Fenstanton. The {Nursery }takes babies and under school aged children from 8am to 5:30pm,those who stay over lunch time, stay to dinner. The{living quarters}of the house were once downstairs as well as upstairs so the{nursery}has more room. { Ladybird}is used by mothers,some who live 10 miles away. {In the summer,}if the weather is fine the children play in the garden. They have a wendy house, a climbing frame and plenty of push-along cars as well as a sandpit. The{Nursery}now has about 36 children on some days and about 10 people helping.
